thread.title_full: Peace and comfort in a four star hotel in Montmartre - Review of Le Relais Montmartre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: fionagee
title: Peace and comfort in a four star hotel in Montmartre
text:
Down a side street only two roads back from the Moulin Rouge, this delightful small hotel is the perfect location for exploring the much more tasteful Rue Des Abbesses and Montmartre village. Notwithstanding the English weather during our stay, we thoroughly enjoyed exploring the truly French part of the city, where we had never been before
Room Tip: When it is cold you will need the towel radiator on for additional heat especially in the bathroom See more room tips
